markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unkillable](/Feats.aspx?ID=3565) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 61</row>

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182)

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
[Zombie Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3557)

**Trigger**
You would be reduced to 0 HP.

</column>

---

You're relentless and nigh unkillable, shrugging off blows that should destroy you, though they might make your body start to fall apart. You are reduced to 1 HP instead of 0 HP. You must succeed at a DC 6 flat check or your body deteriorates.
name: Unkillable
